com.pushtechnology.diffusion.transform.adder

Interface SafeTopicAdderBuilder<S,T>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - The type of value understood by the topic
    T - The type of value updates are provided as
    All Superinterfaces:
    TopicAdderBuilder<S,T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BoundSafeTopicAdderBuilder<S,T>, UnboundSafeTopicAdderBuilder<S,T>

    public interface SafeTopicAdderBuilder<S,T>
extends TopicAdderBuilder<S,T>
    An extension to TopicAdderBuilder that creates SafeTopicAdders.
    Author:
    Push Technology Limited
